title: "Sozaijiten" FF Dax-like sans
content:
Can anybody tell me what font this is? I think i’ve seen it before in a logo for Portugal.

 [‹ (x) Shangri-Las logo - Thalia {Tim D}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806210029/http:/typophile.com/node/19372 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Mobile Alert - ITC Avant Garde Gothic, Freshbot {Geoff, Richard} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806210029/http:/typophile.com/node/19305 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ajags

comments.content: One could almost think somebody did something quite unsanitary with [FF Dax](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806210029/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.10269.4.13&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=s+o+z+a+i+j+t+e+n&sampleSize=24).
thanks.... the “e” and the “j” seem very diferent.... it might be a modification though.
